unstake_warning: Unstaking may affect your cashback bonus level. Check the forecast before confirming.
invalid_stake_value_desc: Please enter a valid amount and select a token to stake.
invalid_unstake_value_desc: Please enter a valid amount and select a token to unstake.
insufficient_token_balance: You don't have enough tokens for this operation.
stake_error_desc: There was an error processing your stake request.
unstake_error_desc: There was an error processing your unstake request.
staking_boost_title: Boost your cashback with Fan Tokens
staking_boost_subtitle: Optional: Stake Fan Tokens to unlock bonus cashback tiers and earn extra rewards on all partner stores.
staking_development_message: We're working hard to bring you the best staking experience. This feature will be available soon!
bonus_levels_development_message: Enhanced cashback levels and rewards system are being developed to provide you with better benefits.
activity_history_development_message: Transaction history and detailed analytics are being developed to provide you with better insights into your rewards.
